en.EXTERN_PASSWORD: Unable to reset your password. Please contact system administrator
en.EMAIL_SENT: Reset instructions are sent to your mailbox
en.PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH: The two passwords do not match
en.PAGE_EXPIRED: This page is expired and does not work anymore
en.FIELD_EMPTY: Value is required and can't be empty
en.RESET_PASSWORD_TEXT:
Someone has requested to reset your password on {host} (account: {account}). If you didn't request this reset, please ignore this message.

Click this link to reset your password: {link}.
